entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning late this evening and ending overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
